Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought her here to introduce her
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm able to live here in town thanks to
you having made such a lovely house.
Thank you so much.
<PAGE>
I'm going to open a <GREEN>tea house</GREEN> here in
the town. 
<PAGE>
The tea house will be open in the <GREEN>Plaza</GREEN>
on <BLUE>Friday, Saturday and Sunday</BLUE>, from
<BLUE>10:00 AM to 6:00 PM</BLUE>. Come for some tea!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everyone in the town will be so happy to
have such a beautiful new resident! I
will definitely come for some tea.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh Dunhill, you smooth talker. Thank you
so much.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Work hard again today!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very nice to have met you. Goodbye for
now.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
